tool_description: Assesses potential impacts of mining operations on surface and groundwater quality and quantity.

water_sources.description: List of nearby water sources (rivers, lakes, aquifers, etc.)

mining_depth.description: Maximum mining depth in meters below surface

water_table_depth.description: Depth to water table in meters

processing_chemicals.description: List of chemicals used in ore processing

error_messages: Invalid depth parameters: Mining depth and water table depth must be positive numbers.
Empty water sources: At least one water source must be specified.
Unknown ore type: Ore type not recognized in database.
Invalid precipitation: Annual precipitation must be non-negative.
usage: Provide water source information, mining parameters, and local hydrology to assess potential water quality and quantity impacts.

groundwater_impact_risk.description: Risk level for groundwater impact (low, medium, high, critical)

surface_water_impact_risk.description: Risk level for surface water impact (low, medium, high, critical)

acid_mine_drainage_risk.description: Risk level for acid mine drainage (low, medium, high, critical)

drawdown_estimate.description: Estimated water table drawdown in meters

affected_water_sources.description: Water sources likely to be affected
